metadata.title: CVE-2018-14638 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in 389-ds-base before version 1.3.8.4-13. The process ns-slapd crashes in delete_passwdPolicy function when persistent search connections are terminated unexpectedly leading to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.18-1').
